mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `project` p WHERE p.is_deleted = 0;
select * from project where id = #{id};
SELECT * FROM project_person pp WHERE pp.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM r_user_projectauth rup where rup.project_id in #{id}
SELECT * FROM `s_project_type`;
SELECT * FROM `s_project_status`;
SELECT * FROM `s_project_level`;
SELECT * FROM `s_project_importance`;
SELECT * FROM `s_project_stage`;
SELECT * FROM workflow;
SELECT * FROM workflow_task;
SELECT * FROM `project` p WHERE p.id IN #{id}
SELECT pd.* FROM product pd LEFT JOIN r_product_project rpp on pd.product_uid = rpp.product_uid WHERE rpp.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT pv.* FROM product_version pv LEFT JOIN r_product_version_project p on pv.product_version_uid = p.product_version_uid WHERE p.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT pm.* FROM product_version_module pm LEFT JOIN r_product_module_project rpmp on pm.module_uid = rpmp.product_module_uid WHERE rpmp.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM r_product_project rpp where rpp.project_id in #{id}
SELECT * FROM r_product_version_project r WHERE r.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM r_product_module_project r WHERE r.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rpa.* FROM r_product_auth rpa LEFT JOIN r_product_project rpp on rpa.product_uid = rpp.product_uid WHERE rpp.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM svn_node_config
SELECT * FROM svn_config_directory scd WHERE scd.project_id IN #{id} AND scd.is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM ticket t WHERE t.project_id IN #{id}

select pec.*, pdc.column_name as `column` from page_entity_column pec left join page_defined_column pdc on pec.column_id = pdc.column_id where pec.entity_id = 10 and pec.is_use_column = 1 and (pec.pojo_name like '%Column%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Single%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Multiple%') order by pec.column_id;
SELECT * FROM file;
SELECT f.* FROM `file` f LEFT JOIN r_ticket_file rtf ON f.`id` = rtf.`file_id` LEFT JOIN ticket t ON rtf.`ticket_uid` = t.`uid` WHERE t.`project_id` IN #{id}
SELECT rtf.* FROM r_ticket_file rtf left join ticket t on rtf.ticket_uid = t.uid where t.project_id in #{id}
SELECT th.* FROM ticket_history th LEFT JOIN ticket t on th.ticket_uid = t.uid where t.project_id in #{id}
SELECT wtt.* FROM workflow_task_ticket wtt LEFT join ticket t on wtt.ticket_uid = t.uid WHERE t.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * from s_ticket_type;
select * from s_ticket_status;
select * from s_ticket_source;
SELECT * FROM s_ticket_severity;
SELECT * FROM s_ticket_resolution;
SELECT * FROM s_ticket_priority;
SELECT * FROM s_ticket_frequency;
SELECT * FROM s_ticket_category;
SELECT rtdst.* FROM r_test_desc_step_ticket rtdst left join ticket t on rtdst.ticket_uid = t.uid where t.project_id in #{id}
SELECT * FROM r_ticket_format_item rtfi LEFT JOIN ticket t ON rtfi.ticket_uid = t.uid WHERE t.project_id IN #{id}

select pec.*, pdc.column_name as `column` from page_entity_column pec left join page_defined_column pdc on pec.column_id = pdc.column_id where pec.entity_id = 1 and pec.is_use_column = 1 and (pec.pojo_name like '%Column%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Single%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Multiple%') order by pec.column_id;
SELECT * FROM s_format_item_status;
SELECT * FROM s_format_item_type;
SELECT * FROM s_format_difficulty;
SELECT * FROM s_format_stability;
SELECT * FROM s_format_expected_level;
SELECT * FROM s_format_item_change;
SELECT * FROM s_format_altered_status;
SELECT * FROM s_format_doc_type;
SELECT * FROM s_format_privileges;
SELECT * FROM s_format_changed_manner;
SELECT * FROM format_doc fd WHERE fd.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM format_doc_floder f WHERE f.project_id IN #{id}
select rfdw.* from r_format_doc_workflow rfdw left join format_doc f on rfdw.doc_uid = f.uid where f.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM format_edition fe WHERE fe.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT fs.* FROM format_section fs left join format_doc fd on fs.doc_uid = fd.uid WHERE fd.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT f.* FROM format_item_changed_record f LEFT JOIN format_doc f2 on f.doc_uid = f2.uid WHERE f2.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT fc.* FROM format_item_comm fc LEFT JOIN format_edition fe ON fc.doc_edition_uid = fe.uid WHERE fe.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT f.* FROM format_item_dispose_history f LEFT JOIN format_section fs ON f.section_uid = fs.uid WHERE fs.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT fc.* FROM format_item_edition_change fc LEFT JOIN format_doc fd ON fc.doc_uid = fd.uid WHERE fd.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM format_item_modify_history m WHERE m.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rfdf.* FROM r_format_doc_floder rfdf LEFT JOIN format_doc f on rfdf.formatdoc_uid = f.uid WHERE f.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rfdit.* FROM r_format_doc_item_type rfdit LEFT JOIN format_doc fd ON rfdit.doc_uid = fd.uid WHERE fd.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rfd.* FROM r_format_docfile rfd left JOIN format_doc f on rfd.doc_uid = f.uid WHERE f.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rfip.* FROM r_format_item_product rfip LEFT JOIN format_item_edition fie ON rfip.item_uid = fie.uid WHERE fie.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rfi.* FROM r_format_itemfile rfi LEFT JOIN format_item_edition fie ON rfi.item_uid = fie.uid WHERE fie.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rufd.* FROM r_user_format_doc rufd LEFT JOIN format_doc f on rufd.format_doc_id = f.uid WHERE f.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT rs.* FROM r_user_format_doc_status rs LEFT JOIN format_doc fd ON rs.format_doc_uid = fd.uid WHERE fd.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT wtfi.* FROM workflow_task_format_item wtfi LEFT JOIN format_item_edition fie ON wtfi.item_uid = fie.uid WHERE fie.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM test_activity ta WHERE ta.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT tas.* FROM test_activity_stage tas LEFT JOIN test_activity a on tas.activity_uid = a.uid WHERE a.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM test_desc td WHERE td.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT tds.* FROM test_desc_section tds LEFT JOIN test_desc t on tds.test_desc_uid = t.test_desc_uid WHERE t.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT tds.* FROM test_desc_step_result tds LEFT JOIN test_desc td ON tds.test_desc_uid = td.test_desc_uid WHERE td.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT tdc.* FROM test_description_case_result tdc LEFT JOIN test_desc td ON tdc.test_desc_uid = td.test_desc_uid WHERE td.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM s_test_activity_level;
SELECT * FROM s_test_activity_status;
SELECT * FROM s_test_case_priority;
SELECT * FROM s_test_case_status;
SELECT * FROM s_test_method;
SELECT * FROM s_test_rule;
SELECT * FROM s_test_stage_category;
SELECT * FROM s_test_type;
SELECT rf.* FROM r_test_desc_case_file rf LEFT JOIN test_desc td ON rf.test_desc_uid = td.test_desc_uid WHERE td.project_id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM s_task_type;
SELECT * FROM s_task_status;
select * from s_task_logtype;
select * from s_task_satisfaction;
select * from s_task_important;
select * from s_task_category;
select * from plan p where p.project_id in #{id};

select pec.*, pdc.column_name as `column` from page_entity_column pec left join page_defined_column pdc on pec.column_id = pdc.column_id where pec.entity_id = 6 and pec.is_use_column = 1 and (pec.pojo_name like '%Column%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Single%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Multiple%') order by pec.column_id;
SELECT * from task t where t.project_id IN #{id} order by t.project_id, t.ID;
select tl.* from task_log tl LEFT join task t on tl.taskUID = t.UID where t.project_id IN #{id};
select rtf.* from r_task_file rtf left join task t on rtf.taskUID = t.UID WHERE t.project_id IN #{id}
select tp.* from task_predecessorlink tp LEFT join task t on tp.taskUID = t.UID where t.project_id IN #{id}
select tph.* from task_progress_history tph LEFT JOIN task t on tph.task_uid = t.UID WHERE t.project_id in #{id}
select th.* from task_history th left join task t on th.task_uid = t.UID where t.project_id IN #{id};
select ta.* from task_assignment ta left join task t on ta.TaskUID = t.UID where t.project_id in #{id};
select ta.* from task_acceptance ta left join task t on ta.taskUID = t.UID where t.project_id in #{id};
select rq.* from report_question rq left join task t on rq.taskUID = t.UID where t.project_id in #{id};
select rqf.* from r_question_file rqf left join report_question q on rqf.question_id = q.id left join task t on q.taskUID = t.UID where t.project_id in #{id};
select * from s_memorabilia_type;
select * from s_events_level;
select * from memorabilia m where m.project_id in #{id}
select rf.* from r_memorabilia_file rf left join memorabilia m on rf.memorabilia_id = m.id where m.project_id IN #{id};
select rm.* from r_memorabilia_user_project rm left join memorabilia m on rm.events_id = m.id where m.project_id IN #{id}
select ec.* from events_criticle ec left join memorabilia m on ec.events_id = m.id where m.project_id in #{id};
select rf.* from r_eventscriticle_file rf left join events_criticle c2 on rf.criticle_id = c2.id left join memorabilia m on c2.events_id = m.id where m.project_id in #{id};
select * from report_question rq where rq.project_id in #{id};
select * from s_question_priority;
select * from s_question_status;
select * from s_question_type;

select pec.*, pdc.column_name as `column` from page_entity_column pec left join page_defined_column pdc on pec.column_id = pdc.column_id where pec.entity_id = 2 and pec.is_use_column = 1 and (pec.pojo_name like '%Column%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Single%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Multiple%') order by pec.column_id;
select * from question q where q.project_id in #{id};
select r.* from r_question_manage_file r left join question q on r.question_uid = q.question_uid where q.project_id in #{id};
select * from s_question_category;
select * from s_question_evaluation_level;
select * from s_question_manage_status;
select * from workflow_task_question wq left join question q on wq.question_uid = q.question_uid where q.project_id in #{id};
select * from workflow_task wt where wt.uid in (select wq.task_uid from workflow_task_question wq left join question q on wq.question_uid = q.question_uid where q.project_id in #{id});
select * from workflow_history wh where wh.task_uid in (select wq.task_uid from workflow_task_question wq left join question q on wq.question_uid = q.question_uid where q.project_id in #{id});

select pec.*, pdc.column_name as `column` from page_entity_column pec left join page_defined_column pdc on pec.column_id = pdc.column_id where pec.entity_id = 11 and pec.is_use_column = 1 and (pec.pojo_name like '%Column%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Single%' or pec.pojo_name like '%Multiple%') order by pec.column_id;
select * from project_risk pr where pr.project_id in #{id};
select * from r_project_risk_file rf where rf.project_id in #{id};
select * from s_risk_status;
select * from s_risk_category;
select * from s_risk_dispose_status;
select * from s_risk_dispose_method;
select * from workflow_task_project_risk pr where pr.project_id in #{id}
select * from workflow_task wt where wt.uid in (select pr.task_uid from workflow_task_project_risk pr where pr.project_id IN #{id});
select * from workflow_history wh where wh.task_uid in (select pr.task_uid from workflow_task_project_risk pr where pr.project_id IN #{id});

select rwhf.* from r_workflow_history_file rwhf left join workflow_history wh on rwhf.history_id = wh.id where wh.task_uid in (select pr.task_uid from workflow_task_project_risk pr where pr.project_id IN #{id});
